description.excerpt: Tensorflow implementation of Neural Turing Machine. This implementation uses an LSTM controller. NTM models with multiple read/write heads are supported.

1. Loss sometimes goes to nan even with the gradient clipping (#2). 
 2. The code is very poorly design to support NTM inputs with variable lengths. Just use this code as a reference.

usage.excerpt:
To train a copy task:

    $ python main.py --task copy --is_train True

To test a *quick* copy task:

    $ python main.py --task copy --test_max_length 10
